Neural Net Stuffs

An experiment to go though the whole life cycle of building, training, and deploying the models. Jupyter notebooks and fastai v1 framework are used to build and train deep neural networks. The models are deployed to backend server for inference. The AWS lambda service is used to expose Rest API and route the requests to the backend inference engine.

Click the links below to test dive the UI.
